pr_title: Show result in exam summary page after result publication date

timeline.message: Get course for links from the url
Only display the score if publishResultsDate is set and in the past
Display result of quiz exercises in exam-summary after dueDate
Don't show the assessment for exam-textexercises before the publishResultDate in the client
Throw forbidden if a student tries to access exam-exercise-feedback before the publishResultDate
Throw forbidden if student tries to access a modeling exercise after the exam has ended and before the results are published
Move auth check for exam results into AuthorizationCheckService

timeline.bodyText: isPublished might be a little bit confusing with regard to isVisible. I guess something like resultsPublished would be more intuitive here.
timeline.author: sascha11110
sascha11110
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -333,4 +337,18 @@ public boolean isUserAllowedToGetResult(Exercise exercise, StudentParticipation
                 && (exercise.getAssessmentDueDate() == null || exercise.getAssessmentDueDate().isBefore(ZonedDateTime.now())) && result.getAssessor() != null
                 && result.getCompletionDate() != null;
     }
+
+    /**
+     * Checks if the user is only student in the course.
+     *
+     * If the exam is over and the results are not published, he is not allowed to request a result.
+     *
+     * @param exercise - Exercise that the result is requested for
+     * @param user - User that requests the result
+     * @return true if user is allowed to see the result, false otherwise
+     */
+    public boolean isAllowedToGetExamResult(Exercise exercise, User user) {
+        return !this.isOnlyStudentInCourse(exercise.getCourseViaExerciseGroupOrCourseMember(), user) || (!exercise.hasExerciseGroup()
+                || !exercise.getExerciseGroup().getExam().getEndDate().isBefore(ZonedDateTime.now()) || exercise.getExerciseGroup().getExam().isPublished());

replies.bodyText: After committing your proposed changes I realised, that there was an error. Nevertheless I've adjusted this condition to make it easier to read and added a clause for each condition in the description
replies.author: JonasPetry

timeline.bodyText:
I would improve the documentation here as it might be hard to understand what the separate conditions actually check (first see my next comment).

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Checks if the user is only student in the course.
          
          
            
                 *
          
          
            
                 * If the exam is over and the results are not published, he is not allowed to request a result.
          
          
            
                 * Checks if the user is allowed to see the exam result. Returns true if
          
          
            
                 * - the current user is at least teaching assistant in the course
          
          
            
                 * - OR if the exam has already ended and the results were published
timeline.author: sascha11110

                 && (exercise.getAssessmentDueDate() == null || exercise.getAssessmentDueDate().isBefore(ZonedDateTime.now())) && result.getAssessor() != null
                 && result.getCompletionDate() != null;
     }
+
+    /**
+     * Checks if the user is only student in the course.
+     *
+     * If the exam is over and the results are not published, he is not allowed to request a result.

replies.bodyText: The idea was that a student is also allowed to see it if the the exam has not ended yet. I've adjusted that in the documentation
replies.author: JonasPetry

timeline.author: sascha11110
sascha11110

timeline.message:
Update src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/service/AuthorizationCheckService.java

Update conditional statement

Co-authored-by: Sascha Beele <sascha@beele.io>
Update logic & documentation to specify whether a student is allowed to see a result
Move examResultsPublished into exercise.model.ts and refactored all corresponding files
Move examResultsPublished into extra method in exercise.model.ts and refactored all corresponding files

Readd future check for ValidVisibleDate

Co-authored-by: Sascha Beele <sascha@beele.io>
